verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
G
O Lord my God
When I in awesome wonder
Consider all the works
Thy hands have made

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I see the stars
I hear the rolling thunder
Thy power throughout
The universe displayed

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Then sings my soul
My Savior God to Thee
How great Thou art
How great Thou art

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
When through the woods
And forest glades I wander
And hear the birds
Sing sweetly in the trees

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
When I look down
From lofty mountain grandeur
And hear the brook
And feel the gentle breeze

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
And when I think
That God His Son not sparing
Sent Him to die
I scarce can take it in

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
That on the cross
My burden gladly bearing
He bled and died
To take away my sin

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
When Christ shall come
With shout of acclamation
And take me home
What joy shall fill my heart

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Then I shall bow
In humble adoration
And there proclaim
My God how great Thou art
